item.title: What is CIBIL Score and how to improve it?
item.description: Jump to: What is CIBIL Score and what factors affect my CIBIL Score? How can I improve my CIBIL Score? What is CIBIL Score and what factors affect my CIBIL Score? CIBIL Score is a 3 digit numeric summary of your credit history, derived by using details found in the ‘Accounts’ and ‘Enquiries’ sections on your CIBIL Report and ranges from 300 to 900. The closer your score is to 900, the higher are the chances of your loan application getting approved.
